Name: Jamieson Ritchie
universityAnswer: 2nd Year Bachelor of Engineering (Mechatronics) and Bachelor of IT (Computer Science), at QUT
whyStudyAnswer: I love solving problems using technology and inventing solutions. I enjoy the hands on (mechanical and electrical), team work aspect along with programming so this degree was the perfect fir
dreamJobAnswer: At this point in time I’m not sure i just want to follow my passion which is why I’m studying engineering and IT
whyRobogalsAnswer: I joined to help inspire students to enjoy STEM. I’ve attended workshops and want to give back to such an amazing program.
appliedStemAnswer: Building robots to enhance our world.
